name: Mister Miracle Mayhem Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: The original Mister Miracle was actually a man named Scott Free.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Scott Free was the second Mister Miracle and Thaddeus Brown's student. Brown, the original Mister Miracle, was murdered. This let Scott Free take the name.

questions.text: Scott Free's father was Izaya Highfather. Under whose watchful eye did Free actually grow up?
questions.explanation:
Granny Goodness.

	To avoid a war with Darkseid, Izaya and Darkseid swapped sons. Scott grew up in the sadistic care of Granny Goodness while Orion, Darkseid's son, grew up on the planet of New Genesis.

questions.text: Scott Free married this super heroine.
questions.explanation:
Big Barda.

	Big Barda was the leader of the Female Furies, a squad of female warriors fighting for Darkseid, evil ruler of Apokolips. She and Scott later fled to Earth and joined the Justice League of America. At seven feet tall, Barda towers over other heroes, like Wonder Woman.

questions.text: Scott Free's manager was named Titan.
questions.explanation:
False.

	The dwarf Oberon served as Mister Miracle's manager. He also accompanied Scott and Barda Free in their tenure as Justice League members and helped Maxwell Lord run the League. He takes his name from Shakespeare's "A Midsummer Night's Dream".

questions.text: Thaddeus Brown was murdered by which criminal?
questions.explanation:
Steel Hand.

	Steel Hand was a mobster who was brought to justice by Scott Free, the second Mister Miracle, after killing the first Mister Miracle, Thaddeus Brown. God Hand is a video-game character and the other two names are made up.

questions.text: The third Mister Miracle was Shilo Norman. At which prison did he work?
questions.explanation:
The Slab.

	Shilo Norman was security chief for the prison informally known as "The Slab", used to hold criminal meta humans. After it was relocated to Antarctica, he was named warden of the facility.

questions.text: By his own admission, Shilo Norman has taken too many culture classes.
questions.explanation:
False.

	He says that he has taken too many philosophy classes, which result in his speaking largely using non sequiturs. Norman has taken classes at New York University. In his spare time, he performed minor magic tricks in Central Park.

questions.text: Shilo Norman is an orphan, and he grew up where?
questions.explanation:
Suicide Slum.

	Suicide Slum is in Metropolis, most famously defended by the Man of Steel himself. Many superheroes have protected Suicide Slum, including Black Lightning and The Guardian.

questions.text: Scott Free appears in the Justice League Unlimited episode "The Ties That Bind". Who lent his voice to the role?
questions.explanation:
Ioan Gruffudd.

	Gruffudd has been seen in the movies "Fantastic Four", "Titanic" and "King Arthur". He was born in 1973 and has a younger brother and sister.

questions.text: In the graphic novel "Kingdom Come", Scott Free is put in charge of the superhuman prison. What was it called?
questions.explanation:
The Gulag.

	A large-scale escape and riot at the Gulag was the setting for the final horrific battle in Mark Waid and Alex Ross' "Kingdom Come". Scott Free was put in charge of the Gulag by Superman.
